pageBlocks.tryItNowTitle: Start recording with the YakShaver browser extension in 3 steps!

tryItNowCards.title: 2. Install

tryItNowCards.title: 3. Start Recording
tryItNowCards.description: Once installed, you can start shaving Yaks! For a detailed rundown, watch the video below.
